title: Ebbe Gehl & Søren Nissen
body:
Søren Nissen & Ebbe Gehl trained at Rud Rasmussen’s workshop in Copenhagen and started their partnership in 1970 as Furniture Designers.  For some years they have been designing many pieces for international furniture brands such as the Naver Collection.

Given their cabinetmaker backgrounds, Timber pieces of beautiful workmanship, which only the best cabinetmakers and furniture factories have been able to make, characterise their designs.

They are best known for their designs for the Naver Collection. These include an extended range of sideboards, china cabinets, coffee tables, chests of drawers and tables.
